ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of potato soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of shrimp soup
des: "Can't get much easier than this!   Serve with a sprinkling of paprika on top."
ins: In a medium saucepan over medium-low heat, combine potato soup, shrimp soup, shrimp, oyster stew, half-and-half, milk, thyme and pepper.  Heat slowly, stirring occasionally, until hot, 20 minutes.
